author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-3207: Allow bin scripts to run without DERBY_HOME set
Inline the contents of derby_common.sh in the shell scripts at build
time so that they contain the necessary logic to find the jar files
even when DERBY_HOME has not been set.

author: jleroux
msg: Reformatted and cleaned following best practices

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2326: Removed SVN checkouts for backwards tests. The backwards branch is now included in the svn repository using "svn copy" after release.
